title: Coronavirus Impact on Wall St. Workers & Dealmaking
itunes:title: Coronavirus Impact on Wall St. Workers & Dealmaking
description:
Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Lananh Nguyen and Bloomberg News M&A Reporter Nabila Ahmed talk about the impact of the coronavirus on Wall Street workers and dealmaking. Bloomberg News Endowments Reporter Janet Lorin discusses life insurance companies pursuing wealthy private colleges for debt. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News U.S. Health Care Reporter Cynthia Koons share their insight on the Supreme Court hearing a stealth attack on abortion rights. Bloomberg Businessweek National Correspondent Josh Green provides an update on Biden vs. Sanders. Bloomberg Businessweek Technology Writer Joshua Brustein shares his insight on where Democratic candidates stand on tech. And we Drive to the Close with Alan Lancz, Research Director at LanczGlobal.com.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
